trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerar den metod som hanterar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.ColumnClick"> </xref> händelsen för en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you create a ColumnClickEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: När du skapar en ColumnClickEventHandler delegat kan identifiera den metod som hanterar händelsen.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Lägga till en instans av delegaten händelsen om du vill associera händelsen med din händelsehanterare.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Händelsehanteraren anropas när händelsen inträffar, om du tar bort delegaten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om händelsehanterare delegater finns [händelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
